General.Name: SI-TECH Information Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Si-Tech Information Technology Co., Ltd. provide cloud, big data, internet of everything, artificial intelligence, and smart operation solutions in China. It also offers cloud network, 5G, and telecom services. In addition, the company provides government and enterprise end to end, smart store, radio and television 5G business support, virtual business cloud, and smart middle station solutions, as well as digital intelligent ecological platform support. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: China Power Information Building, Beijing, China, 100086
